subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Because of a day off on Monday, the Yankees gave Randy Johnson the option of pushing his start back a day to get his mechanics straightened out. Johnson will pitch as scheduled tonight against the Indians, but Manager Joe Torre said the decision was not made final until yesterday.
